title: My Thoughts on The Decided Changes For Champions.
body:
Mapple released this, so I will give him what I have in mind.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwWrZI9VAAAGTyY.jpg:large

I would give Renekton a second thought though, since his play rate and win rate overall is quite well, according to U.GG. Mundo, I would love buffed, however, you have to take into account that he will become a monster if, buffed in the wrong places.

The other champions I can agree on, and I would love seeing Jarvan again. 

Nerf wise, Galio should just be turned back to what he was before all this nonsense. A few tweaks here and there and he would be perfect for Solo and Pro play without being OP as a tank.

As for {{item:3916}} I do not see a reason for it being nerfed. But whatever reason you have I will go with it. 

Honestly, Akali was an easy fix how you guys manage to fuck it up is beyond me. Keep the True Stealth, but keep it as a defensive option only, and buff some of her sustain or damage.

Disagreement:
Renekton; For his already clear presents and stable win rate. He is in no need for a buff or nerf.

Split Opinion:
{{item:3916}}; I do not see a reason to. It helps but does not make Mages OP. It may also be me being biased for being a mage main, but I do not see a reason to since one MR item is enough to negate all that MP and Damage. Honestly, I say go for it, but be careful about the change.

Agreement:
Everything else really, nothing looks silly. I understand where they want to go with it, and I would love to see what they give.

Thanks for reading, if there is anything you agree with or disagree with, let me know.

GL HF

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
